body:
i'm thankful that though i felt a bit nauseous after eating breakfast this morning, it has mostly passed.

i'm thankful that though i didn't want to take out the trash and recycling last night, i did it anyway. i'm thankful that the sanitation workers came and took it away this morning.

i'm thankful for [this photo of albert ayler greeting the sun](https://twitter.com/AtBestIsKorny/status/808508023773622273). i'm thankful for the new sun ra singles compilation. i'm thankful for alice coltrane.

i'm thankful for [ta-nehisi coates](https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2017/01/my-president-was-black/508793/). i'm thankful my president is black. i'm thankful for [barry jenkins](https://twitter.com/BandryBarry/status/808480714236653568).

i'm thankful that it was hard going back to work but i'm thankful that i got through the day and got a lot of things done. i'm thankful that today is a new day.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful that though i felt a bit nauseous after eating breakfast this morning, it has mostly passed.

i'm thankful that though i didn't want to take out the trash and recycling last night, i did it anyway. i'm thankful that the sanitation workers came and took it away this morning.

i'm thankful for [this photo of albert ayler greeting the sun](https://twitter.com/AtBestIsKorny/status/808508023773622273). i'm thankful for the new sun ra singles compilation. i'm thankful for alice coltrane.

i'm thankful for [ta-nehisi coates](https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2017/01/my-president-was-black/508793/). i'm thankful my president is black. i'm thankful for [barry jenkins](https://twitter.com/BandryBarry/status/808480714236653568).

i'm thankful that it was hard going back to work but i'm thankful that i got through the day and got a lot of things done. i'm thankful that today is a new day.
